description: An in-depth look at various styles of close quarters fighting.  There's an amusing essay about dirty tricks in the front section.

variants.description: An in-depth look at various styles of close quarters fighting.  There's an amusing essay about dirty tricks in the front section.
Barbaric guide how to win a fight in worst possible scenarios - mostly about how to retreat from such fight, but still has some information in the cases you have no another way.
The book teach user the method to predict enemies attacks, with nice explanation of how to react on each of them - both defense and counterattacks.

name.str_pl: copies of Out of the Cage

variants.description: The book shows lot of techniques from different martial arts, and a way to deal with them.
Illustrated handbook about human body, how it works, and how to destroy it with fairly easy steps.

name.str_pl: copies of Close Quarter Fighting Manual

description: A well-thumbed hardbound book which illustrates simple strategies and techniques for close quarters combat encounters.

name.str_pl: copies of Close Quarter Fighting Manual

variants.description: A well-thumbed hardbound book which illustrates simple strategies and techniques for close quarters combat encounters.
"Will You Be The Last One Standing?", asks the author on the first page.  You don't know the answer, but the book contain plenty of info to reach this target.
Different techniques to end the fight fast, easy, and without going to prison.  Luckily no one can imprison you anymore!
